segments.text: Hi , who has the remote control ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do . Why , do you want me to change the channel ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . I can't stand watching the channel any more .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think they have pretty good programmes . But I'll change it if you really want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I hate Channel 5 . I'd rather just listen to the radio .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't make such a fuss . I'm sure you will like today's programme .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A basketball match between Chinese team and American team .
segments.speaker: S1
